name: Witch Tales
description:
Every witch needs to learn how to ride their own broomstick. Everyone learns at their own pace. Who will be that last one standing, showing that they are the best witch at the academy? Get ready to fly!

Witch Tales is a couch multiplayer game for up to 4 players. Battle your friends in this charming game, filled with cute witches

Game Features:
  • Local Multiplayer (requires 2 - 4 players)
  • 4 Unique characters to choose from - Designed after the four Seasons
  • Controller support
  • Original animations
